description:
If you’re looking to float over the softest terrain, wider is better. Wider than the 4s the Dillinger 5 offer more grip on soft surfaces and while cornering. If your fat bike needs a new set of winter tires or you just want to try riding all year-round, the Dillinger 5s will keep you rolling when the trails are covered in snow. Outfitted with 252 studs, you will roll smoothly on ice and frozen dirt.

  • 252 hardened steel studs bite into snow and ice
  • Lugged sidewall for traction while cornering
  • Tubeless ready for those low PSI powder crawling moments
  • 45NRTH does not recommend these tires for use with e-bikes, as the additional torque leads to premature stud loss
name: 45NRTH Dillinger 5 27.5 x 4.5in Studded Folding Fat Tire
